title: AIDA Single Pole Double Paddle Rocker Decorator Light Switch, 15 Amp Self-grounding Electrical Light Switches, Residential Grade, UL Listed (1 Pack, Glossy White)

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #65,249 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #219 in Electrical Light Switches       #219 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: 【Two combinated Single Pole Switch】AIDA double paddle rocker Switch allows to control of 2 fixtures from one location. Ideal for use in residential and most commercial where space in the electrical wall box is limited.
【Self-Grounding】It can be automatically connected to a well-grounded metal wall junction box.
【High Quality】Decorator rocker switch is made of impact-resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel, which is beautiful and durable.
【Easy Installation】Provide both back wiring and side wiring. Shallow back body leaves more space for wires in the box.
【Universal Application】Wall switch suitable for residential use and most commercial areas that require only 15Amp switches.
【100% Guarantee & Service】UL & CUL listed , Backed 30-days free return & free lifetime technical online support within 24 hours.

customers_say: Customers find the light switch works well, is of good quality, and is easy to install. They also appreciate its good price. The finish receives mixed feedback, with some customers describing it as sleek while one notes it's not matte.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This switch was very easy to install. It appears to be made of quality material and the spring function for the two rocker switches are very good. They have a solid and quiet feel when pushed. A good product that I would purchase again.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExactly as I expected
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Works great and exactly what I expected

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Good fit. Holding up well in sunroom.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Value for money and sleek. However, did not like the shiny finish, would prefer matte. Rather than that recommended
